subtitle: The lentils in this dish add substance and bite, whilst the basil sets off the tomatoes very well.

method.text: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and saute garlic and onion until soft. Add bay leaf, tomatoes and basil and cook for 2 min.

Stir in celery and lentils. Pour in enough water to generously cover the vegetables. Bring to the boil and cook on a high heat for 15 min. Lower heat and simmer for 20 min or until lentils are tender. Season to taste.
Serve immediately, garnished with chopped fresh basil.

title: Red lentil, tomato and basil soup
